mapper.select: select user_id ,user_googleId from user_tb where user_googleId = #{user_googleId}

INSERT INTO USER_TB ( user_id, user_name, user_googleId, user_phone, user_address, user_zip, user_email, user_gender, user_bday, user_inDate, user_manager, user_pending )VALUES( usersql.nextval, #{user_name}, #{user_googleId}, #{user_phone}, #{user_address}, #{user_zip}, #{user_email}, #{user_gender}, #{user_bday}, sysdate, 1 , 1 )
